comment.author: Shania
comment.text: Mr. Trump, PLEASE release your income tax returns so we can avoid the crap we went through with Obama! As a supporter I would just like to avoid the controversy, of which there is enough without this issue, and I'd like to see other issues take precedent.

replies.author: Josiah
replies.text: If he releases them, it will show he donated to the Clinton Foundation.

replies.author: Codie
replies.text: Because it's none of your business

replies.author: Josiah
replies.text: Codie T. I think it is when he's going to run as my President. Thank you!

replies.author: Blake
replies.text: For goodness sake drop it. Why doesn't Hillary release ALL of her emails. Why don't you ask her?
